metadata.description:
76 pages!
The race is on for a princess, a liar, a knight and an assassin; all of which are after the same thing: the Elixir of Eternity, A single draught that will grant everlasting life. Only one of them will get it. There are twists, double-dealings, betrayals and no small amount of dry comedy in this well-crafted adventure story.
metadata.name: The Elixir
